member.name: T:Discord.Interactions.ParameterPreconditionAttribute
member.summary: Requires the parameter to pass the specified precondition before execution can begin.

member.name: P:Discord.Interactions.ParameterPreconditionAttribute.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets the error message to be returned if execution context doesn't pass the precondition check.
member.remarks: When overridden in a derived class, uses the supplied string as the error message if the precondition doesn't pass. Setting this for a class that doesn't override this property is a no-op.

member.name: M:Discord.Interactions.ParameterPreconditionAttribute.CheckRequirementsAsync(Discord.IInteractionContext,Discord.Interactions.IParameterInfo,System.Object,System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Checks whether the condition is met before execution of the command.
member.param: The parameter of the command being checked against.
The raw value of the parameter.
The service collection used for dependency injection.

member.name: T:Discord.Interactions.PreconditionAttribute
member.summary: Requires the module or class to pass the specified precondition before execution can begin.

member.name: P:Discord.Interactions.PreconditionAttribute.Group
member.summary: Gets the group that this precondition belongs to.
member.remarks: of the same group require only one of the preconditions to pass in order to be successful (A || B). Specifying = null or not at all will require *all* preconditions to pass, just like normal (A && B).

member.name: P:Discord.Interactions.PreconditionAttribute.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets the error message to be returned if execution context doesn't pass the precondition check.
member.remarks: When overridden in a derived class, uses the supplied string as the error message if the precondition doesn't pass. Setting this for a class that doesn't override this property is a no-op.

member.summary: Checks if the command to be executed meets the precondition requirements.
member.param: The service collection used for dependency injection.
